page.title: EMC Third-Quarter Net Jumps
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - EMC Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=EMC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">EMC.N</A>, the top maker of corporate data storage equipment, on Tuesday reported quarterly profit jumped amid market-share gains against rival storage suppliers.
